meanings.definition: A vessel in which the consecrated Host is exposed for adoration.
meanings.sent1: During the church service, the priest held up the monstrance for everyone to see.
meanings.sent2: The golden monstrance sparkled in the sunlight as it displayed the sacred Host.
meanings.sent3: The monstrance seemed to glow with a special light, making it look like a magical treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were fixed on the monstrance, as if it held the key to all her prayers.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the monstrance made it a breathtaking sight during the ceremony.

meanings.definition: A transparent receptacle in which the consecrated Host is exposed for veneration.
meanings.sent1: The glass monstrance allowed the faithful to see the consecrated Host clearly.
meanings.sent2: People knelt in reverence as the priest displayed the Host in the transparent monstrance.
meanings.sent3: The children were fascinated by the see-through monstrance, thinking it was like a magical glass box.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight passing through the monstrance created a beautiful rainbow effect in the church.
meanings.sent5: The delicate craftsmanship of the transparent monstrance made it a cherished object in the church.
